entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 700 metres. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 800 metres rising to 1300 metres late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
